  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "Scrolling Contents Layer",
      "bounds": [1200, 900],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF",
      "invalidations": [
        [180, 50, 30, 31],
        [0, 50, 30, 31],
        [180, 120, 30, 30],
        [0, 120, 30, 30]
      ]
    }
  ]
}
